answers.answer: Hi!  As far as I know and knowing other diabetics both t-1 and t-1, tend to get a gut and that is from the insulin.

question: I have long been self concious about my weight...Don't get me worng I'm not fat but my stomach does have a but of a pooch.I was talking to my mom about it and she said thats common in folks with diabetes is this true??
title: diabetes and a gut
